title: Emerald amulet (u)

This grants the player 70 Crafting experience. The amulet can then be strung with a ball of wool to create a strung emerald amulet, granting an additional 4 experience. The strung amulet can be enchanted into an amulet of defence using the Lvl-2 Enchant spell, requiring level 27 Magic.

Advanced data
Item ID1677

An emerald amulet (u) can be made at level 31 Crafting by using a gold bar on a furnace while carrying a cut emerald and an amulet mould. This grants the player 70 Crafting experience. The amulet can then be strung with a ball of wool to create a strung emerald amulet, granting an additional 4 experience. The strung amulet can be enchanted into an amulet of defence using the Lvl-2 Enchant spell, requiring level 27 Magic.

This amulet can also be strung with a magic string instead, turning it into a pre-nature amulet. This amulet can then be enchanted into an amulet of nature.

[[File:Emerald amulet (u) detail.png|left|100px]]
An '''emerald amulet (u)''' can be made at level 31 [[Crafting]] by using a [[gold bar]] on a [[furnace]] while carrying a cut [[emerald]] and an [[amulet mould]]. This grants the player 70 Crafting experience. The amulet can then be strung with a [[ball of wool]] to create a strung [[emerald amulet]], granting an additional 4 experience. The strung amulet can be enchanted into an [[amulet of defence]] using the [[Lvl-2 Enchant]] spell, requiring level 27 [[Magic]].

This amulet can also be strung with a [[magic string]] instead, turning it into a [[pre-nature amulet]]. This amulet can then be enchanted into an [[amulet of nature]].
